description: Completed different sections for the library @scaleleap/amazon-mws-sdk
@scaleleap/amazon-mws-sdk is a completely typed out SDK for Amazon's Marketplace Web Service
Made multiple fullstack webapps using Typescript, React and Express/Koa
Integrated the Elastic Stack for collecting logs on users' progress and activity
Used Lambda for multiple purposes, from small one-of tasks to running an Express REST API using Serverless Framework
Integrated AWS S3 into a web application for the purpose storing images and using the images in the web app
Part of the main development team for Studylane and GlobalStudyPartners. A web application that helps connect schools with potential students wanting to study in Australia
Created various parts of the REST API from search results to saving and updating data in the database
Implemented filtering through lazy-loading to a table previously being loaded all at once and only filtering client-side
Implemented JWT authentication to a new admin page instead of the previous session based authentication
Worked on various project frontends using jQuery, Bootstrap and Wordpress
Worked on the backend of Numo, a web app that connects various lending services and users depending on their answers to a survey. Written in PHP and Slim
